column3: Test build: https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/pulls/7251/\nSeems not to work.... maybe my gitian builder can't handle the new .yml files?\n

Sorry, mea culpa! I must not set `reference_datetime` to some future date.

```
checking whether build environment is sane... configure: error: newly created file is older than distributed files!
Check your system clock
```
utACK\nThis is only (externally visibly) used for file timestamps in and on the produced archives, so it doesn't hurt changing it as long as it is deterministic.\n
Merged via eb2b745 (somehow github doesn't detect it?)\n

> @laanwj somehow github doesn't detect it

This was for 0.12 and master is already on 0.13, so GitHub did it right. It doesn't hurt to have it in master as well.
